trans-unit.source: A service behavior that allows you to configure the <xref href="System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore"></xref> feature, which supports persisting state information for workflow service instances into an SQL Server 2005 or SQL Server 2008 database.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您設定的服務行為<xref href="System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore"></xref>功能，支援保存的狀態資訊到 SQL Server 2005 或 SQL Server 2008 資料庫的工作流程服務執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior"></xref> class using the connection string passed as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior"></xref>類別使用的連接字串做為參數傳遞。

trans-unit.source: This constructor internally initializes an instance of the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore> object using the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會在內部初始化的執行個體<xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore>物件使用的連接字串。</xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore>

trans-unit.source: A connection string that refers to a SQL Server persistence database.
trans-unit.target: 指的是 SQL Server 持續性資料庫的連接字串。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AddBindingParameters" name="AddBindingParameters" href=""></xref> method of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior"></xref> interface, which allows you to pass custom data to binding elements to support contract implementation.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref uid="langword_csharp_AddBindingParameters" name="AddBindingParameters" href=""></xref>方法<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior"></xref>介面，可讓您將自訂資料傳遞至繫結項目以支援合約實作。

trans-unit.source: The service description of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服務的服務描述。

trans-unit.source: The host of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服務主機。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點。

trans-unit.source: Custom objects to which binding elements have access.
trans-unit.target: 自訂繫結項目可存取的物件。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ApplyDispatchBehavior" name="ApplyDispatchBehavior" href=""></xref> method of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior"></xref> interface that allows you to change run-time property values or insert custom extension objects such as error handlers, message or parameter inspectors, security extensions, and other custom extension objects.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref uid="langword_csharp_ApplyDispatchBehavior" name="ApplyDispatchBehavior" href=""></xref>方法<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior"></xref>介面，可讓您變更執行階段屬性值或插入自訂延伸物件，例如錯誤處理常式、 訊息或參數偵測器、 安全性延伸模組和其他自訂延伸物件。

trans-unit.source: Description of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服務的描述。

trans-unit.source: The host of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服務主機。

trans-unit.source: Gets the connection string used to connect to persistence database.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來連接持續性資料庫的連接字串。

trans-unit.source: The connection string.
trans-unit.target: 連接字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.HostLockRenewalPeriod*>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.HostLockRenewalPeriod*>.</xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.HostLockRenewalPeriod*>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the interval within which a host must renew its lock on an instance before the lock expires.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會指定在其中主機必須更新其鎖定執行個體上的鎖定到期之前的間隔。

trans-unit.source: If the host does not renew the lock in the specified time period, the instance is unlocked and another host can obtain the lock on the instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果主機未在指定的時間週期內更新鎖定，執行個體已解除鎖定，另一部主機都可以取得執行個體上的鎖定。

trans-unit.source: The specified time period before the instance is unlocked.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體已解除鎖定之前的指定的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceCompletionAction*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceCompletionAction*>屬性。</xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceCompletionAction*>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether the instance state information is kept in the persistence database after the instance is completed.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會指定執行個體完成後，是否要執行個體狀態資訊保留在持續性資料庫中。

trans-unit.source: Keeping instances after completion causes the persistence database to grow rapidly and this affects the performance of the database.
trans-unit.target: 完成會使持續性資料庫快速成長，而這會影響資料庫效能之後，仍保留執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You should configure a database purge policy to delete these records periodically to ensure that the performance of the database is at the level that satisfy your performance requirements.
trans-unit.target: 您應該設定資料庫清除原則來刪除這些定期以確保資料庫的效能層級的記錄符合您的效能需求。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the instance state information is kept in the persistence database; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果執行個體狀態資訊會保留在持續性資料庫;否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceEncodingOption*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceEncodingOption*>屬性。</xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceEncodingOption*>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether the instance state information is compressed using the GZip algorithm before the information is saved in the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會指定執行個體狀態資訊是否會壓縮前資訊會儲存在持續性存放區使用 GZip 演算法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the instance state information is compressed using the GZip algorithm; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果執行個體狀態資訊使用 GZip 演算法壓縮;否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceLockedExceptionAction*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceLockedExceptionAction*>屬性。</xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceLockedExceptionAction*>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies what action a service host should take when it receives an <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref> when the host tries to lock an instance because the instance is currently locked by another host.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指定服務主機在接收時應該採取什麼動作<xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref>當主機嘗試鎖定執行個體，因為目前被另一部主機鎖定執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The options allowed for this field are: None, Basic Retry, and Aggressive Retry.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位允許的選項為︰ 無、 Basic Retry] 及 [Aggressive Retry。

trans-unit.source: The default value is None.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 None。

trans-unit.source: The following list provides you with the descriptions for these three options: - None.
trans-unit.target: 下列清單提供您這三個選項的描述:-無。

trans-unit.source: The service host does not attempt to lock the instance and passes the <xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException> to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 服務主機不會嘗試鎖定執行個體，以及傳遞<xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException>給呼叫者。</xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException>

trans-unit.source: - Basic Retry.
trans-unit.target: -Basic Retry。

trans-unit.source: The service host reattempts to lock the instance with a linear retry interval and passes the exception to the caller at the end of the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 服務主機會重新嘗試鎖定執行個體，以線性重試間隔，並將例外狀況傳遞至位於順序結尾的呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: - Aggressive Retry.
trans-unit.target: -積極重試。

trans-unit.source: The service host reattempts to lock the instance with an exponentially increasing delay and passes the <xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException> to the caller at the end of the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 服務主機，重新嘗試鎖定執行個體，以指數遞增延遲，以及傳遞<xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException>至位於順序結尾的呼叫端。</xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException>

trans-unit.source: The action a service host should take when receiving a <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此動作的服務主機時，應該採取接收<xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of SQL connection retries.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 SQL 連接重試次數上限。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 4.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 4。

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the maximum number of SQL connection retries.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SQL 連接重試次數上限的整數。

trans-unit.source: Promotes properties that can be used in queries.
trans-unit.target: 升級屬性可以在查詢中使用。

trans-unit.source: The promoted properties are the properties that you can use in queries to retrieve instances.
trans-unit.target: 升級的屬性是您可以使用的屬性在查詢中用於擷取執行個體。

trans-unit.source: These property can be of simple type (int32, string, bool and so on), which is represented by a variant or binary.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性可以是簡單型別 （int32、 字串、 bool 等等），由變數或二進位表示。

trans-unit.source: Name of the promotion.
trans-unit.target: 提升的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The names of variables that must be promoted as variants.
trans-unit.target: 必須提升為變數的變數名稱。

trans-unit.source: The names of variables that must be promoted as binary data.
trans-unit.target: 必須提升為二進位資料的變數名稱。

trans-unit.source: Binary data is typically used to store tracking information.
trans-unit.target: 二進位資料通常用來儲存追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod*>屬性。</xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod*>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the time period after which the SQL Workflow Instance Store runs a detection task to detect any runnable or activatable workflow instances in the persistence database after the previous detection cycle.
trans-unit.target: 指定之後，SQL 工作流程執行個體存放區會執行偵測工作，偵測持續性資料庫中的任何可執行或可啟動的工作流程執行個體，在上一個偵測循環之後的時間週期。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the time interval.
trans-unit.target: 傳回時間間隔的值。

trans-unit.source: Inspects the service host and the service description to confirm that the service can run successfully.
trans-unit.target: 會檢查服務主機和服務描述，以確認服務能夠順利執行。

trans-unit.source: The description of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服務的描述。

trans-unit.source: The host for the service.
trans-unit.target: 服務主機。
